attributes.action: Lower Bus Prices in Greater Manchester for school children to 50p
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recently, there has been an unprecedented rise in childrens bus prices from an acceptable price of 50p to an extortionate 70p for a single ticket. This is an outrageous increase! Pensioners now receive free travel, why is this not the case for equally deserving school children?
